name: PM-KISAN Scheme
description: A government scheme with the objective to supplement the financial needs of all landholding farmers' families.
eligibility: All landholding farmer families, who have cultivable landholding in their names.
benefits: Financial benefit of Rs. 6000/- per year is provided to all eligible farmer families, payable in three equal 4-monthly installments of Rs. 2000/- each.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: A crop insurance scheme to provide insurance coverage and financial support to the farmers in the event of failure of any of the notified crop as a result of natural calamities, pests & diseases.
eligibility: All farmers including sharecroppers and tenant farmers growing notified crops in the notified areas are eligible for coverage.
benefits: Provides comprehensive insurance coverage against crop loss, helping to stabilize the income of farmers.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchai Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Launched with an aim to enhance physical access of water on farm and expand cultivable area under assured irrigation, improve on-farm water use efficiency, introduce sustainable water conservation practices etc.
eligibility: All farmers are eligible. Priority given to small and marginal farmers.
benefits: Financial assistance for adopting micro-irrigation systems like drips and sprinklers. Promotes water conservation.
